com.brightcove.utils

Class DownloadImageTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.String,java.lang.Void,android.graphics.Bitmap>
      • com.brightcove.utils.DownloadImageTask

  • public class DownloadImageTask
extends android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.String,java.lang.Void,android.graphics.Bitmap>
    Utility AsyncTask class to managing the loading of an image into a ImageView or as a background to a View.

    Example:
    new DownloadImageTask(view).execute(imageUrl, fallbackImageUrl, ...);

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Maximilian Nyman (max.nyman@anvilcreative.com)
    See Also:
    AsyncTask

      • doInBackground

        protected android.graphics.Bitmap doInBackground(java.lang.String... urls)
        Background process for loading the bitmap image, and attempt to load fallback images if necessary
        Specified by:
        doInBackground in class android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.String,java.lang.Void,android.graphics.Bitmap>
        Parameters:
        urls - string array of image url, starting with the preferred image url followed by any number of fallback images
        Returns:
        the loaded bitmap image to use for updating the view element
        Since:
        1.0

      • onPostExecute

        protected void onPostExecute(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap)
